The '''VMDK''' ('''V'''irtual '''M'''achine '''D'''is'''k''') [[file format]] is a type of [[virtual appliance]] developed for [[VMware]] products. The format is [[Open format|open]]/documented.<ref name="vmdk-disk-format" />
==Products that use the format== * [[VMware Workstation]] * [[VMware Player]] * [[VMware Server]] * [[VMware Fusion]] * [[VMware ESX]]
== Third-party products with VMDK support== * [[Sun xVM]] - natively supports VMDK format<ref>[http://www.sun.com/software/products/xvm/xvm_whitepaper.pdf Sun xVM Virtualization Portfolio: Virtualizing the Dynamic Datacenter]</ref> * [[QEMU]] - natively supports VMDK format and provides the ''qemu-img'' utility to convert VMDK images to a number of different formats * [[VirtualBox]] (part of the Oracle VM suite) also supports VMDK files<ref>http://blogs.sun.com/tpm/entry/virtualbox_1_6_at_community</ref> * [[SUSE Studio]] - builds [[virtual appliance|virtual appliances]] using the VMDK format, among others
== Software Libraries with VMDK support== * [[VMware VDDK]] - VMware's Virtual Disk Development Kit, freely available to anyone with a VMware.com account (has redistribution rights limited to certain VMWare partners<ref>[http://communities.vmware.com/community/developer/vddk VMWare Virtual Disk Development Kit]</ref>) * [[.NET DiscUtils]] - Open Source C# library
== Specification Document== * VMDK 1.1 Format Specification<ref name="vmdk-disk-format" />
